Title: Creates a distinctive parking placard to allow midwives to park closer to patients' homes in order to provide swift care
Summary: Creates a distinctive parking placard to allow midwives to park closer to patients' homes in order to provide quicker access and swift care.
LawCode: Amd ยง1203, add ยง404-ff, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to creating a distinctive parking placard to allow midwives to park closer to patients' homes in order to provide swift care
